article_title: Hadid sisters donate $1m to Palestinian aid effort
sentence: The  conflict  began  when  Hamas  gunmen  launched  an  unprecedented  attack  on  Israel,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  252  back  to  Gaza  as  hostages.

article_title: Hadid sisters donate $1m to Palestinian aid effort
sentence: More  than  36,000  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  the  start,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
